column4: Hello....I need help... but not sure where to go... VLC cannot play h264 suddenly
how do I fix
it says VLC does not support the audio or video format "h264". Unfortunately there is no way for you to fix this.
but before it did play them
what about restricted format package?

I was using N-muench ppa
https://help.ubuntu.com/community/RestrictedFormats
and i tried to make fix a problem with DLNA but now I cannot use it any

i tried get-deb and nmuench and cannonical
I cannot remember what happened and I am not sure where to look for fix
please help
sorry for my english.  I am not using a translation, so I can type more quick

it
